items.content_html: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
items.title: Ghulam-Ali-Khan/Authify: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.

items.content_html: Swarm.js is a Node.js implementation of OpenAI’s experimental Swarm framework. This SDK allows developers to orchestrate multi-agent systems using OpenAI’s API in a lightweight and ergonomic way, while leveraging Node.js for building scalable, real-world applications.
items.title: youseai/openai-swarm-node: Swarm.js is a Node.js implementation of OpenAI’s experimental Swarm framework. This SDK allows developers to orchestrate multi-agent systems using OpenAI’s API in a lightweight and ergonomic way, while leveraging Node.js for building scalable, real-world applications.
